did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: Collection includes two photographs from 1962 of Shelton receiving an "Outstanding Trainee" certificate for his basic training company at Fort Jackson, South Carolina. Also includes a letter from the Fort Jackson Commanding General to VPI President Walter S. Newman about Shelton's award.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Billy G. Shelton Collection must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Billy G. Shelton Collection, Ms1961-004 - Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Billy G. Shelton Collection was donated to Special Collections.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Billy G. Shelton Collection commenced and was completed in 1962. Additional description was completed in May 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Billy G. Shelton graduated from VPI in 1961 with a degree in Building Construction. No other biographical information is available.
A yearbook picture is available on page 315 of the 1961 Bugle (page 319 of the PDF file).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection includes two copies of a photograph from 1962 of Shelton receiving an "Outstanding Trainee" certificate for his basic training company at Fort Jackson, South Carolina. The collection also contains a letter from the Fort Jackson Commanding General, Major General Charles S. D'Orsa, to VPI President Dr. Walter S. Newman about Shelton's award. The letter commends both Shelton's efforts at Fort Jackson, and the high caliber of VPI graduates going on to military service.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.
